Topic.Title: Dialog with Sybil

Message.Msg: "Do you really think they will default on the puts?" Yes. The optionz market will fail to operate correctly in the crash and optionz contracts will not be honored. Derivativez were initially not going to be honored in the '08 crash until the fed and treas stepped in with talf & tarp. The crash will happen this time BECAUSE of optionz and the etfs that use them - optionz are a buckey shop bet and have been amplified and stuffed into the system by the cboe to such an extent that you now have HOURLY binary optionz to trade..... The optionz market will be at the epicenter of the next financial collapse along with muni bond debt... Stox are toast az 'banks' will dump them in a nanosecond to 'preserve calital' . Sybil would not bet optionz.

Topic.Title: Dialog with Sybil

Message.Msg: The derivatives you speak of in the 2008 crash were credit default swaps. There was never any serious chance that stock options would not be honored. They are backed by money that put and call sellers must post, and by the Options Clearing Corporation. If that fails, what chance do you think your shorts will be paid off?

Topic.Title: Dialog with Sybil

Message.Msg: Shorts are a direct bet on the underlying, optionz are derivativez - they will fail to be honored, but dont take sybs word for it - hit the crack pipe hard and you'll have to find out for yourself.

Message.Msg: "Actually, enough people are calling for that for it not to happen. " Out of pure dejection afterbeing completely beat down or "on the sidelinez", more people hold this thought then are actually bearish. Sheeple are 'buying the dips' right now, feeling the urge that they gotta 'get back in', and of course the massive amount of retail short covering speaks for its self. Thesemarkets are gonna be PUNISHED for 3 solid weeks, at which time the 'dip buyerz' will buy at the 200 day. Wall street will let the dip buyerz feel like they are 'Winning' through december, where the buy, hold and add retailerz will add at the top, then ....... The lights go out in a VERY dramatic fashion az robots UNPHVCKINLOAD into the retailerz , pension fundz, and 401k'z in a phvckin nano second. There will be no prisonerz on the long side, they will all get murdered. The government and the fed iz gonna stand helplessly by az they spent all their bullets. The fed will say no more QE az they say "we have reached 'full employement' " , which will have been reached by attrition of unemployement bene's running out, and 50 somethingz throwing in the towel on ever finding a job again in their lifetimez. Bond interest rates, particularly the short and mid term will skyrocket az foriegn investorz say "no thanks at 1.5%, we need 7%"... Thats where the merry go round stops. 2014-2015 iz gonna be HORRIFIC in the markets.

Message.Title: Dear Uncle Warren, here is my billion buckaroos for your charity ...
Message.Msg: Dear Uncle WarrenB: [OL] here is my billion buckaroos worth of trade-tip for your charity contribution additions: You've already stated publicly recently that you are not finding much worth buying in the market. So, you realize that its overbought. You also then know that AMZN is the King of the Overbought. So, here is one tip that you can execute (and you have the wherewithal to do it ... I'm just the idea person): Daily, for a few days, buy continuous streams of AMZN-puts in large chunk. After that, start shorting the AMZN stock: 1st week by 1B, next week another 1B; then raise up the stake-- 2B worth of short for next two weeks (you can do it). WS will take notice. Looking at all those large block sells, they will start selling also. In 2-3 months, you can then cooly book 1B worth of profits easily, closing out all those positions! [And take this as my 1B worth of contribution and add it to your charitable foundation! That will give you and me immense satisfaction! May the Lord Bless!
